00002     #ifndef BOOST_IDL_MIRROR_INTERFACE_HPP
00003     #define BOOST_IDL_MIRROR_INTERFACE_HPP
00004     #include <boost/idl/member_from_signature.hpp>

00007     #include <boost/fusion/container/generation/make_vector.hpp>
00008     #include <boost/fusion/functional/generation/make_fused_function_object.hpp>

00010     namespace boost { namespace idl {
00011         
00012         template<typename MemberPtr>
00013         struct mirror_member
00014         {
00015         };
00016 
00017         namespace detail {
00018         template<typename C, typename M>
00019             static M& do_get( C* c, M C::* m )
00020             { return c->*m; }
00021         }
00022 
00023         template<typename Class, typename MemberType>
00024         struct mirror_member<MemberType Class::*>
00025         {
00026             typedef MemberType signature;
00027             static const bool is_const = false;
00028 
00029             operator MemberType& ()
00030             {
00031                 return get();
00032             }
00033             operator const MemberType& ()const
00034             {
00035                 return get();
00036             }
00037             MemberType& operator = ( const MemberType& a )
00038             {
00039                 return get() = a;
00040             }
00041             const MemberType& operator * () const
00042             {
00043                 return get();
00044             }
00045             MemberType& operator * ()
00046             {
00047                 return get();
00048             }
00049 
00050             const MemberType& operator -> () const
00051             {
00052                 return get();
00053             }
00054 
00055             MemberType& operator -> () 
00056             {
00057                 return get();
00058             }
00059 
00060             template<typename C>
00061             void set_delegate(  C*& s, MemberType C::* m )
00062             {
00063                 MemberType& (*do_get_impl)(C*, MemberType C::* ) = &detail::do_get;
00064                 get = boost::bind( do_get_impl, s, m );
00065             }
00066 
00067             mirror_member& operator = ( const boost::function<MemberType&()> a ) { get = a; return *this; }
00068             boost::function<MemberType&()>                  get;
00069         };
00070         
00071         struct mirror_interface 
00072         {
00073             template<typename MemberPointer>
00074             struct calculate_type
00075             {
00076                 typedef mirror_member<MemberPointer>  type; 
00077             };
00078         };

00082     #define PARAM_TYPE_NAME(z,n,type)   BOOST_PP_CAT(typename A,n)
00083     #define PARAM_TYPE(z,n,type)   BOOST_PP_CAT(A,n)

00085     #define PARAM_ARG(z,n,type)     PARAM_TYPE(z,n,type) PARAM_NAME(z,n,type)

00105 #define n BOOST_PP_ITERATION()
00106 #define PARAM_NAMES          BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_NAME,A) // name_N
00107 #define PARAM_ARGS           BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_ARG,A) // TYPE_N name_N
00108 #define PARAM_TYPE_NAMES     BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_TYPE_NAME,A) // typename TYPE_N
00109 #define PARAM_TYPES          BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_TYPE,A) // TYPE_N
00110 
00111     template<typename R, typename Class BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) PARAM_TYPE_NAMES>
00112     struct mirror_member<R(Class::*)(PARAM_TYPES)const> 
00113     {
00114         typedef mirror_member                                             self_type;
00115         typedef boost::fusion::vector<PARAM_TYPES>                        fused_params;
00116         typedef boost::function_traits<R(PARAM_TYPES)>                    traits;
00117         typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(*)(PARAM_TYPES)>::type   signature;
00118         // boost::result_of
00119         typedef R                                                         result_type;
00120         static const bool                                                 is_const = true;
00121         R operator()( PARAM_ARGS )const
00122         {
00123             return m_delegate( boost::fusion::make_vector(PARAM_NAMES) );
00124         }
00125         R operator() ( const fused_params& fp )const
00126         {
00127             return m_delegate( fp );
00128         }
00129         mirror_member& operator=( const  boost::function<R(PARAM_TYPES)>& d )  
00130         {
00131             m_delegate = d;
00132             return *this;
00133         }
00134         template<typename C, typename M>
00135         void set_delegate(  C*& s, M m )
00136         {
00137             m_delegate = boost::fusion::make_fused_function_object( make_fast_delegate(s,m) ); 
00138         }
00139         boost::function<R(const fused_params&)> m_delegate; 
00140     };
00141 
00142     template<typename R, typename Class  BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) PARAM_TYPE_NAMES>
00143     struct mirror_member<R(Class::*)(PARAM_TYPES)> 
00144     {
00145         typedef mirror_member                                             self_type;
00146         typedef boost::fusion::vector<PARAM_TYPES>                        fused_params;
00147         typedef boost::function_traits<R(PARAM_TYPES)>                    traits;
00148         // boost::result_of
00149         typedef R                                                         result_type;
00150         typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(*)(PARAM_TYPES)>::type   signature;
00151         static const bool                                                 is_const = false;
00152         R operator()( PARAM_ARGS )
00153         {
00154             return m_delegate( boost::fusion::make_vector(PARAM_NAMES) );
00155         }
00156         R operator() ( const fused_params& fp )
00157         {
00158             return m_delegate( fp );
00159         }
00160         mirror_member& operator=( const  boost::function<R(PARAM_TYPES)>& d )  
00161         {
00162             m_delegate = d;
00163             return *this;
00164         }
00165         template<typename C, typename M>
00166         void set_delegate(  C*& s, M m )
00167         {
00168             m_delegate = boost::fusion::make_fused_function_object( make_fast_delegate(s,m) ); 
00169         }
00170         boost::function<R(const fused_params&)> m_delegate; 
00171     };
